head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MOSESSON, ESTHER W.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MOSESSON, ESTHER W.

block.p: MOSESSON-Esther W. Died on September 19th, 2000 at age 94. Beloved wife of the late Benjamin Mosesson, devoted mother of Michael and Shirley (McDowell) Mosesson, and Judy and Ira Dembrow, cherished grandmother of Matthew and Amber (Jost) Mosesson, Marni and William Kambol, Aimee Mosesson, Adam Dembrow and Beth Dembrow, adored great grandmother of Harper Mosesson, loving sister of the late Archie, Beatrice, Blanche, Helen, Herbert, Lille, and Norman, & caring aunt of many nieces and nephews. Services Thursday 9:45 A.M. at Plaza Memorial Chapel, 630 Amsterdam Avenue (at 91st Street). In lieu of flowers, contributions can be made to The Esther and Benjamin Mosesson Fund for Thrombosis Research, The Blood Research Institute, PO Box 2178, Milwaukee, WI. 53201-2178.
